thread.title: Late-March winter storm on the way for Toronto. Here's what to expect
thread.title_full: Late-March winter storm on the way for Toronto. Here's what to expect

title: Late-March winter storm on the way for Toronto. Here's what to expect
text: Just when Mother Nature had everyone fooled with balmy, double-digit temperatures earlier this month, another significant winter storm is coming. Special weather statements are in effect, with Toronto and the GTA expecting anywhere from 10 to 15 cm. 4h ago Just when Mother Nature had everyone fooled with balmy, double-digit temperatures earlier this month, another significant winter storm is coming. Special weather statements are in effect, with Toronto and the GTA expecting anywhere from 10 to 15 cm. 4h ago Up to 10 centimetres of snow could fall in parts of Toronto on Friday. Melissa Duggan speaks with a TTC spokesperson to find out how the transit agency is preparing for the potential storm, which could include the temporary closure of some bus stops. 11h ago Ana Safavi says she lost everything after she reported she had been sexually harassed by a supervising doctor. Now she is going before the Human Rights Commission hoping to get her residency back so she can finally practice medicine. Donald Trump could have assets like Trump Tower or Mar-a-Lago seized next week, if heâ€™s unable to post his $454 million bond by Monday. Brandon Choghri with a look at the potential consequences for the Republican frontrunner.
